entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to update runtime ids using runtimeGroups.props #57702
    untriaged
  • Need to run non-English text through UTF8Encoding for PGO scenarios #57698
    tenet-performance, untriaged, runtime-coreclr, 7.0.0

Updated

  • BadImageFormatException when trying to load c++/cli .net 5 assembly into c# .net 5 project #57642
    needs more info, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Feature proposal: remove implicit construction of DateTimeOffset from DateTime #32954
    api-suggestion, area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, Future
  • API documentation debt - Microsoft.Extensions.Http #43916
    documentation, up-for-grabs, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, zbb-exception, 6.0.0
  • System.Net - Undoc 6.0 APIs #54857
    documentation, area-System.Net, zbb-exception, 6.0.0
  • Question: Limits of loaded assemblies #57652
    question, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, untriaged
  • [HTTP/3] ReadAsStreamAsync_HandlerProducesWellBehavedResponseStream test fails #53087
    area-System.Net.Http, disabled-test, Future
  • Remove dotnet6 feeds when dependencies publish into dotnet7 feeds. #57716
    blocking-release, area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 7.0.0
  • Usage of GetReferencedAssemblies does not return assemblies not used/loaded #57714
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, untriaged
  • iOS: building with LLVM causes some exception catch clauses to not work #56100
    blocking-release, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, os-ios, 6.0.0
  • Does setting a COMPlus_ environment variable after the application has already started take effect? #57713
    untriaged

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/5.0] Add Fedora 36 RID #57703
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • fix PYTHONPATH on Linux #57701
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from mono/linker #57700
  • Fix `ThreadPool.SetMinThreads` and `SetMaxThreads` to return false when they don't override the preconfigured value #57699
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Remove `CROSSGEN_COMPILE` define usage #57697
    area-CrossGen/NGEN-coreclr
  • Remove scripts for running CrossGen1 on SPCL #57696
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix padding mode precondition in RSAAndroid #57695
    area-System.Security
  • Delete code under FEATURE_PREJIT #57693
    area-CrossGen/NGEN-coreclr
  • Add more stress-testing for Inliner #57691
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc1] JIT: don't clone loops where init or limit is a cast local #57690
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make implicit function declaration an error #57688
    community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix incorrect VN when folding GT_NEG(GT_MUL(A, C)) #57686
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] JIT: don't clone loops where init or limit is a cast local #57685
    blocking-release, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Fix stress issues around multiple threads throwing the same exceptions #57684
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JsonPath not using last frame during continuation #57681
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc1] [mono] Fix crash in common_call_trampoline due to inconsistent rgctx mode #57677
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Fix crash in common_call_trampoline due to inconsistent rgctx mode #57676
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Refactor `EQ`/`NE` morphing #57671
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Bump timeout for workloads build job #57637
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Throw on invalid payload length in WebSockets #57635
    area-System.Net
  • [release/6.0] Throw on invalid payload length in WebSockets #57636
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net, 6.0.0
  • test: add Missing unit tests for Grouping.Any #57550
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Some cleanups in Assembly/Loader area #57023
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, auto-merge
  • Remove CrossGen1 from R2RTest project #57692
    area-CrossGen/NGEN-coreclr, auto-merge, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][aot] Enable more passing test assemblies on AOT #57678
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries, wasm-aot-test, 7.0.0
  • Remove `FEATURE_READYTORUN_COMPILER` define from non-JIT code. #57672
    area-Interop-coreclr, auto-merge, 7.0.0

Updated

  • [release/6.0-rc1] Bump timeout for workloads build job #57721
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [main] Update dependencies from dnceng/internal/dotnet-optimization dotnet/runtime-assets dotnet/hotreload-utils dotnet/arcade #57627
  • Enable runtime tests with closed issues #57720
    increase-code-coverage
  • Validate CompressionLevel value is defined in BrotliStream ctor #57561
    area-System.IO.Compression, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Minor stress improvement #57715
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Elide SocketFlags in Socket API #57634
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add documentation to Microsoft.Extensions.Http #57719
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • Enforce scatter/gather file I/O Windows API requirements et. al. #57424
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, Future
  • cache SystemPageSize #57718
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • FileStream.Unix: improve DeleteOnClose when FileShare.None. #55327
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Abort response stream on dispose if content not finished #57156
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Bring XmlReader{Async} to one behavior #51736
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Refactor XmlQualifiedName #57646
    area-System.Xml
  • [release/5.0] Fix ReadOnlySequence created out of sliced Memory owned by MemoryManager #57562
    area-System.Memory, 5.0.x
  • extend the NO_BUFFERING tests and cover all scenarios #57717
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #57628
  • use ArrayPool instead of having a private buffer cache #45690
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add support for native relinking after Build, and AOT after publish #57556
    arch-wasm
  • Give tvOS a special value for Personal/MyDocuments #57508
    os-tvos
  • Remove PlainPointer, RelativePointer and RelativeFixupPointer #57707
    area-CrossGen/NGEN-coreclr
  • Add tizen amrel build CI for pull request #56281
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, sdk, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK, validation-sdk-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK #sdk-102548-.NET6.0.1xxSDK #19861
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, sdk, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 1, validation-sdk-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 1 #sdk-102550-.NET6.0.1xxSDKRC1 #19859
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet workload install creates .nuget with root permissions in clean env #19823
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, 6.0.1xx
  • After install 6.0 Preview 7 on Mac OS, install workload maui using command line failed. #19822
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, 6.0.1xx

Closed

  • Workload: Add offline cache option to repair command #19775
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Pathmap does not seem to be working, resulting in determinism failure #15321
    untriaged
  • A referenced assembly was compiled using a newer version of Microsoft.Windows.SDK.NET.dll. #19363
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

Updated

  • Publishing standalone app (C#) fails with C++/CLI dependency #12345
    6.0.1xx
  • Something changed in VS 2022 Preview 3 and VS 2019 16.11 that breaks VB WinForms Apps #19735
    Area-External, Area-NetSDK, Discussion
  • WPF/Winforms fails to run. #19871
    untriaged
  • Cannot get symbol ucol_setMaxVariable_50 from libicui18n #16009
    untriaged
  • Maui: Workload installation failed: The transaction has aborted #19739
    Area-Workloads, 6.0.1xx
  • Update implicit global usings feature to address issues #19521
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK, 6.0.1xx
  • Add workload force clean option #19603
    Area-Workloads, 6.0.1xx
  • manifest authoring or manifest reading is broken for the latest stage 0 #19866
    release blocking, Area-Workloads
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main sdk, .NET 7.0.1xx SDK, validation-sdk-.NET 7.0.1xx SDK #sdk-102567-.NET7.0.1xxSDK #19862
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • IncludeNativeLibrariesForSelfExtract includes XML and other files into output binary #19322
    Bug, Area-SingleFile, 6.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Check that SDK and app archs match before setting `DOTNET_ROOT` when using `dotnet run` #19860
    Area-External, Team:Runtime
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/command-line-api #19853
    Area-CodeFlow
  • Change dotnet-new output encoding to utf8 #19847
    Area-External, 7.0.1xx
  • Update stage 0 #19842
    Area-Workloads
  • Fix workload update #19835
    Area-Workloads
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #19824
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/templating #19821
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [main] Update dependencies from devdiv/DevDiv/NuGet-NuGet.Client-Trusted #19809
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from nuget/nuget.client #19808
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from nuget/nuget.client #19807
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [main] Update dependencies from nuget/nuget.client #19806
    Area-CodeFlow

Merged

  • Cherry-pick changes to 6.0 branch #19848
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/roslyn #19849
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/windowsdesktop #19836
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/roslyn #19851
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/fsharp #19843
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/aspnetcore #19845
    Area-CodeFlow

Updated

  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/templating #19870
  • Could not copy the file deps.json because it was not found. Microsoft.Common.CurrentVersion.targets #17943
  • Cache results of ResolveTargetingPackAssets across builds #19570
    Area-NetSDK
  • Implicit RID support #19725
    Area-External
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #19781
    Area-CodeFlow
  • Fix workload update #19703
    Area-Workloads
  • Update Versions.props for 7.0 branding #19800
    Branding
  • [Package Validation] resolve references when running API Compat #19771
    Area-Compatibility
  • [WIP] Support installing workloads in user folder #18823
    Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add integration test for Inheritance margin #55714
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Benchmark algorithm options for LongestCommonSubsequence #55712
    untriaged
  • Re-enable MetadataReference integration test #55711
    Area-IDE, Integration-Test, untriaged, Infraswat, 17.0
  • AD0001: Could not resolve type with token 01000094 from typeref (expected class 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Syntax.BaseParameterSyntax #55708
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Roslyn allows pointers to `Span<T>` if runtime assemblies are referenced directly #55707
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Internal modifier added to partial classes breaks new project creation for WinForms, WebTools and anything using partial classes in their templates #55703
    Bug, Area-IDE, 4 - In Review, Urgency-Soon, 17.0
  • Unexpected logger failure when opening a solution #55702
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Introduce local doesn't use var keyword #55698
    Bug, help wanted, Area-IDE, Investigation Required, 17.0
  • CompilerGeneratedAttribute not applied to all generated functions #55697
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Closed

  • Getting a message that a new .editorconfig was found and asking if I want to add it to the solution, but i already have one as part of the solution #51785
    Bug, Area-IDE, Investigation Required, Backlog
  • System.ArgumentNullException while opening .editorconfig file #53831
    Bug, Area-IDE, 17.0
  • Method group invocation syntax resolves Enumerable rather than Queryable #55325
    Area-IDE, Resolution-Not Applicable, Resolution-Not Reproducible, Concept-Continuous Improvement, 17.1
  • Command line way to apply code fixes #48561
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Need Design Review, Dev17 IDE Priority, Backlog
  • `TypeLoadException` resulted by using interpolated string in PowerShell #55609
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Interpolated String Improvements, 17.0

Updated

  • Add option to disable graphical .editorconfig UI #54925
    Area-IDE, Concept-Continuous Improvement, Developer Community, Feature - Editor Config UI, 17.0
  • Exhaustiveness check quacked on nested deconstruction #55719
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • String interpolation produces incorrect output for concatenated strings #55569
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Flaky test: TupleWithElementNamedWithDefaultName #52658
    Area-Compilers, Test, Infraswat, 17.0
  • Transient failure in test AsyncIteratorWithCustomCode #34207
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams, 17.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't add accessibility modifiers to partial classes in new documents #55713
    Area-IDE
  • Change the head of inheritance margin background to InActiveTextBox #55710
    Area-IDE
  • Implement PackageSettingsPersister.TryFetch #55709
    Area-IDE
  • Skip flaky test #55706
    Area-Interactive
  • Add feature to simplify code to use the new extended property patterns when available. #55704
    Area-IDE, Feature Request
  • Address Interpolated Strings test plan #55701
    Area-Compilers
  • Pass updated types to the debugger #55699
    Area-Interactive, 17.0.P4
  • Have inheritance-margin hold onto data that does *not* point back at Solution instances. #55696
    Area-IDE
  • Specify paths and shell on Windows #55694
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [LSP] Add semantic tokens caching case #55692
    Area-IDE
  • Allow code actions to apply themselves asynchronously (part 2) #55687
    Area-IDE
  • KeybindingResetDetector refactoring #55686
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • fixed broken link #55693
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Add two more icons to the inheritance margin. #55383
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Treat overload with Delegate parameter as not applicable if lambda delegate type cannot be inferred #55357
    Area-Compilers, 17.0.P4
  • Use string.Format when an interpolated string part is dynamic #55642
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Remove unused interface #55684
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • List patterns: subsumption checking #53891
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.0
  • EnC - Parameterless struct constructors #55718
    Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC
  • Don't consider syntax trees changed if the compilation is the same #55715
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.0
  • Change Inheritance Margin Header style #55533
    Area-IDE
  • Update Arcade and require .NET 6 Preview 7 SDK #55681
    Area-Infrastructure
  • IEditAndContinueSolutionProvider #55717
    Area-Interactive
  • Use directory-scoped ALCs to load analyzers in .NET Core #55098
    Area-Compilers
  • Have add-using respect EditorBrowsable attributes. #55669
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Lazily evaluate the root node for syntax trees #55716
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.0
  • Disallow nullable suppression in patterns #54072
    Area-Compilers
  • 🧹 Services cleanup following previous review #49127
    Area-IDE
  • Consider MatchPriority when comparing CompletionItems when filter text is lowercase only #55562
    Area-IDE
  • Add Reference refactoring and imports #55581
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Move Static Members
  • 🐇 Ensure recoverable syntax trees are pushed to temporary storage #55399
    Area-IDE
  • Show destination name #55650
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Move Static Members
  • EnC - Tests for lambda improvements #55224
    Area-Interactive
  • Move inheritance margin to its own view margin #55674
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • .Net 6 Preview 7 - Cannot set reponse headers before returning IAsyncEnumerable in controller #35364
    :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved, area-web-frameworks

Updated

  • SignalR client NPM package corrupt #35494
  • Localization API improvements #35497
    api-suggestion
  • VS Code : There is no explanation for the method in intellisense Completion list #29675
    bug, area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.vscode, Razor.Tooling
  • Open Views/Shared/_Layout.cshtml ,type " <input asp-test="" " in the <body> tag and delete a double quote, the format is incorrect. #35495
    area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.vs
  • VSCode: CodeLens references numbers cannot be loaded if re-open the project #35493
    area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.vs
  • [HTTP/3] Kestrel closes connection too soon #35470
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel, HTTP3
  • Blazor WASM: Upgrading to .NET 6 preview 7 breaks localization #35459
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, feature-localization
  • Blazor WebAssembly App does not build when referencing .NET Standard 2.0 assembly. #35349
    bug, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, Author: Migration Bot :robot:
  • Allow @page directive in Razor Components to accept constant strings #35465
    enhancement, area-blazor, area-razor.compiler, Backlog
  • Weatherforecast runs into unhandeled error with new VS2022 Update #35477
    investigate, area-blazor, blazor-wasm

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0-rc1] HTTP/3: Add tests for issue and unskip fixed tests #35475
    area-runtime, tell-mode
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime dotnet/efcore #35474
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc1' => 'release/6.0' #35473
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • Identity UI Bootstrap 5.1 tweaks #35467
    area-identity
  • [release/6.0-rc1] E2E test fixes #35460
  • [release/6.0-rc1] HTTP/3: Fix incorrectly pooling aborted streams #35441
    area-runtime, ask-mode, 6.0-rc1
  • Set EndpointName and DisplayName given method name in endpoints #35439
    Servicing-approved, ask-mode, area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • HTTP/3: Response drain timeout #35322
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/efcore #35471
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Fix SignalR TS unit tests not running on CI #35464
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 6.0-rc1
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime dotnet/efcore #35468
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 6.0-rc1
  • HTTP/3: Fix incorrectly pooling aborted streams #35434
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime dotnet/efcore #35438
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 6.0-rc2
  • Fix SignalR TS unit tests not running on CI #35422
    area-signalr, signalr-client-javascript, 6.0-rc1
  • E2E test fixes #35414
    6.0-rc1
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/efcore #35437
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Add support for TryParse(HttpContext, ...) to RequestDelegateFactory #35433
    6.0-rc1
  • Add FailureReasons #35425
    area-security, 6.0-rc1

Updated

  • Added support for type based parameter binding #35496
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0-rc1] HTTP/3: Response drain timeout #35492
    area-runtime, ask-mode, 6.0-rc1
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime dotnet/efcore #35402
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/efcore #35479
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Improve Minimal APIs support for request media types #35082 #35230
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • Add an analyzer that complains when using using model binding attributes with a minimal action delegate (#35359) #35480
  • [release/6.0-rc1] HTTP/3: Use new QuicStream.ReadsCompleted property in transport #35483
    area-runtime, ask-mode
  • Skip consistently failing Components.E2ETests.ServerExecutionTests #35484
    area-blazor
  • HTTP/3: Use new QuicStream.ReadsCompleted property in transport #35482
    area-runtime
  • Update middleware that assumes UseRouting is called after them, for minimal hosting #35426
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks
  • Binding support for 'bool' values with InputRadioGroup and InputSelect #35318
    area-blazor
  • Fix 'HeadOutlet' getting trimmed away for Blazor WebAssembly prerendered apps after publish #35419
    area-blazor
  • Cancel the token when it's created after an Abort/Disconnect #35418
    area-runtime
  • Reset HttpRequestPipeReader error state if reused #35432
    area-runtime
  • Support binding to form and form file parameters in minimal actions #35158
    community-contribution, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet workload install` and maui-check fail [Bug] #2159
  • [Bug] Dynamically changing FlexLayout Direction from code-behind does not re-layout UI #2155
  • [Bug] MSAL B2C 'Window Not Found' #2154
  • [Bug] Updating Image Properties through Code-Behind does not reflect in UI. #2153
    partner, partner/ui-tools
  • [Bug] BackgroundColor doesn't update when applied to Page #2152
    partner, partner/ui-tools, 6.0.100-rc.1
  • Status of window-level menus and toolbars (for desktop apps) #2151
  • Lots of build Error when Creating MAUI Blazor App using VS2022 File New Project Template #2168

Closed

  • [Bug] HTML TextType on Label does not render HTML as elements #1998

Updated

  • [Bug] Valid splash screen colors populated from SKColor #2170
  • [Spec] Implement ContentView inside Core #1302
  • System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping support #2167
  • Window11 cannot debug WinUI project in MAUI template [Bug] #2104
  • [Bug] FilePicker throws System.InvalidOperationException: 'Window Not Found' #2102
  • Ensure dotnet new Maui builds on non windows full msbuild Cli #2165
    area/single project ☝️, 6.0.100-rc.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Call disconnect on handler when it's removed from a virtualview #2160
  • Make Application.Properties obsolete and fix implementation #2158
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • BackgroundColor should trigger Background #2157
  • [Handler]Collectionview handler for iOS #2156

Merged

  • [workload] use **FromWorkload** for targeting/runtime pack versions #2122
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #2141

  • AbsoluteLayout #2136

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support new .NET 6.0 LINQ features #25570
    type-enhancement, area-query, User Story
  • Support the new SingleOrDefault/FirstOrDefault/LastOrDefault overloads that allow specifying a default #25569
    type-enhancement, propose-punt, area-query, consider-for-next-release
  • Support SQL translation for .Net 6 Linq's MinBy/MaxBy Methods #25566
    type-enhancement, customer-reported
  • Inverse property mapping ignores namespace in partial class property #25565
    customer-reported

Closed

  • Questions about Compiled Models #25576
    closed-question, customer-reported
  • Using Cosmos provider OrderBy owned property throw exception togheter with OData #24510
    closed-could-not-reproduce, area-query
  • Cosmos: Add translators for member/methods which map to built-in functions #16143
    type-enhancement, closed-fixed, good first issue, area-query, area-cosmos, community-contribution, 6.0.0-rc1

Updated

  • Why are AppendIdentityWhereCondition and AppendRowsAffectedWhereCondition abstract and rest is virtual? #10431
    type-cleanup, providers-beware, needs-design, area-save-changes
  • Improve data access performance #24110
    Epic, Epics
  • Query: Consider translating String.Equals(String, StringComparison) for selected values of StringComparison #1222
    type-enhancement, needs-design, area-query, Backlog
  • Query/Table Hints (raw SQL, such as OPTIONs) #6717
    type-enhancement, area-query, area-relational-mapping, Backlog
  • Query: NRE when trying to project count of navigation typed as ICollection<T> #22701
    type-bug, verify-fixed, area-query, 6.0.0
  • AsSplitQuery sporadically missing navigation properties #25556
    customer-reported
  • OwnedType use HasData() throw a InvalidOperationException #25586
    customer-reported
  • Frequent deadlocks on concurrent inserts with identity columns #25345
    customer-reported, area-save-changes, area-sqlserver, consider-for-next-release, Backlog
  • EF Core database insert fails when table has a SQL INSTEAD OF trigger #12064
    type-bug, needs-design, customer-reported, punted-for-2.2, punted-for-3.0, area-save-changes, 6.0.0
  • Allow opt-out of rows affected check #10443
    type-enhancement, customer-reported, area-save-changes, Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Query: Allow using STET overload for Set in query filter/defining query #25581
    auto-merge
  • Migrations Bundles: Address API Review feedback #25580
  • Undelete an entity when it has been orphaned and then reparented #25574
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25573
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Fix some test determinism issue #25572

Merged

  • Fix to #25013 - Outstanding work for temporal tables #25563
  • Make compiled model and runtime initialization thread-safe #25559
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25564
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25575
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Correct FromSqlRaw docs #25568
    auto-merge
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25562
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Update branding to 7.0.0-alpha1 #25561

Updated

  • Query: Don't expand include on entity reference which will be convert… #25585
  • Change the default subfolder/subnamespace for compiled models to CompiledModels #25584
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 7.5.8 to 8.0.1 #25245
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Approach for referencing conceptual docs #25530
